name: Ali Naqvi

projects.title: Papyrus
projects.description: Papyrus is a productivity application loosely based on Evernote. Everyone could use a little help getting and staying organized-- at Papyrus we can help you do that. Create notes on your dashboard and add tags to them. You can also add notes to notebooks!

projects.title: Amuse
projects.description: Amuse is a social media app where musicians can create a profile page, add songs,  connect to their communities. Fans can listen to their favorite artists!

projects.title: Strife
projects.description: Strife is a discord-clone where users can participate in different servers with a live text chat. This project leverages the use of Websockets in order to create a live chat experience for users.

projects.title: The Museum of Online Art
projects.description: MoOA - the Museum of Online Art - is an online collective for artists in which they can share their original artworks and other users can like and comment on their work. MoOA is inspired by Medium .

aboutpara: I am a software developer based in Chicago. I make simple and clean fullstack applications. I take pride in making accessible products that cherish inclusivity.

resume.description: I deliver clean and well-designed user experiences. Well-versed with React, Javascript, SQL, NoSQL and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Generated over $40000 in sales using leads and consulting walk-ins,  Maintained order of digital and paper filing systems, Fabricated custom designs for doors and windows by employing the use of third-party design software

Supervised the opening and closing of the photography output lab,  Managed chemistry for a high traffic dark room, Assisted in the use of large format printers and software, Ensured regular maintenance of printers, scanners and computers

experiences.position: Full Stack Engineer 24-Week Immersive Bootcamp - App Academy
experiences.bullets: Rigorous 1000-hour software development course with <3% acceptance rate, Topics include: TDD, scalability, algorithms, OOP, REST, security, single-page apps and web development best practices, Experienced hundreds of hours of pair programming

education.universityName: BA Education - State University of Colorado Boulder
